div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem tercio die mensis Junij anno
quo supra

The said' day mathews tymmirman was conuict' be ane Suorne assis' Jonhne Colisone
forspekar for Alexander layng within his avne hous' for the quhilk he was in Amerciament of the
court and tile amend' as law wile and forber' in tyme to Cum et cetera And' the saide alexander
was quit of ale trubulance of the saide mathews et cetera Ande atour the saide mathews
was conuict' for tribulance and cruele hurting of Anne for the quhilkis he was
in Amerciament of the court et cetera Ande the assis' ordanit the said' mathews to pay xl s' to
the said' Anny et cetera and to pay the leche for the lechin' of hir' et cetera

Curia Balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem quinto die
mensis Junij Anno Dominj et cetera

The said day thir personis that is to say thomas buchane Johnne baxtar
Richerd redhed Donald baxter and thomas straloche was conuikit be thar avin
toung grant for the brekin of the pas' of breid' gevin to thame be the
townn' ffor the quhilkis it was statut and ordanit ordanit be the Prouost
baillies and consaill present for the tyme that gif euire ony of thame brekis
the pas' in tyme tocum sall pay v markis to sanct nicholas werk

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem sexto die
M Junij Anno quo supra

The said day Johnne Kay skippar of ane boyt callit the nicholace
of Disart Alexander langschankis and Johne thomsone his marinaris
deponit the gret aitht that thai deliuerit demi chaldir of beir In to leitht
to Robert Waus mair than thai Ressauit tharof demi boll pertenyt
to henry Wilyeamsone tharof It was fundin that the said Johne'
Kay sall mak pament of the said half boll of beir And compt' Rek
nyng and pament of the Rest of the xiij bollis of beir And demi bolle

The said day Johnne kay grantit that Robert Waus bad' him
ressaue iiij s' fra Dauid Kintor for ane firlot of beir quhilk
the said Dauid deliuerit him

Septimo die mensis Junij anno quo supra Johannis kay Rector sub deo vinius'
nauiclem de disard' nicholace vocatus fecit constituit creauit et nominauit
Johannem levinstone Dauid Kintor et Johannem meldrum coniunctim et diuisim suos
legitimos viros et Indubitatos procuratores actores factores in actionibus et causis de
batabilibus inter ipsum et Robertum Waus et in omnibus aliis actionibus ipsum
concerns Agendum prosequendum respondendum et defendendum et ceteras promittens de Rato et grato
Cum ceteris clausulis necessariis et oportunis et cetera

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem nono die
mensis Junij Anno quo supra

The said day the Prouost and baillies assignit friday that nixt cumis
till henry Reid' till ansuer to the borgh' strekit one him be Katherin
mowat for that wranguis' withhaldin fra hir of vj s' ij d' for the Rest
of tua yeris fee aving to hir And marioun' naucthj spous' to the said
henry for the wranguis' Intrometting of iij eln' of quhit claitht
price eln' xxx d' iij li' of woll price li' viij d' and ane approun' price
vj d'

add.foreign: protestacio Alexander hay contra Richardum hendirson tinctorem

div.p:
The said day comperit Alexander hay and offerit him reddy till ansuer'
to the borgh' fundin one him be Richerd hendirsone litstar Anent the
warandice of ane pip of wad et cetera as is contenit in the Act maid tharapoun'
befor as day of peremptour quhilk Richerd lauchfully warnit callit and
nocht comperit to follou the said borgh' was in amerciament of the court Tharfor
the said alexander protestit for his costis skathis dampnis and expens' And
to be quyt of the said Richerdis chalang sen' that day was assignit
to him as day of peremptour

Curia Balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem decimo
sextouo die mensis Junij Anno quo supra

Eodem die Compertum fuit per Inquisicionum Curie quod Johannes
Sanchar est legittimus et propinquior heres quondam Alexandrj sanchar'
patris suj Ideo dederunt balliuis in mandatis ad cognoscendum ipsum Johannem
ad terras et annuos redditus sibi de Jure contingenti Jacente infra dictum burgum

The said day the bailyeis assignit monunday that nixt cummys to Duncan gilrutht
to preif sufficientlie that he fand ser Androw colisonis merchand butht dur'
oppin but lok or key quhen he Intromettit tharwitht vndir the pain of ane
amerciament of viij s' vnforgevin

The said day Elene blak was inamerciament of the court be ane suorne'
assis' Androu fiff forspekar for the strublance of Agnes Ratre the
spous of Dauid steuart And till amend as law will and forber'
in tyme tocum

The said day Johnne loremar meldrum was conuict' be ane suorne assis'
Androu fyf forspekar for the strublance of William loremar And
the said Williame for strublance of the said Johnne' And the first prouo
cacioun' maid be the said Johnne And athir of the said partijs till
amend' till vthiris as law will and forber in tyme to cum

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xix die mensis
Junij anno quo supra

The saide day Robert Jofrasone grauntit him borghe' to Dauid Coupar for viij
stane of will quhilkis the officiar' at commavnde of the balyeis chargit him
to pay within terme of law et cetera

The saide day Dauid falconer of balAndrowe lauchfullie callit and nocht comperit tile ansuer
to the borghe' fundin one bim be Elizibetht leslie the Relict of vmquhile Alexander menyeis
for the wranguis withhaldin fra hir of ane hors' witht xl s' tharfor the balyeis ordanit
officiar' to pas' and tak ane stres' of the said' Dauid and lat it Agane to
borghe' gif it be askit and warne him to Comper this day xv dais to
ansuer to the saide borghe' as secund' day of proces'

The said' day the balyeis assignit this day xv dais to nichole elphinstone
of the glak tile ansuer to the borghe' fundin one him be Roberte
Jofray that the he awe to releiwe him and keip him skathles of viij stane of
wole at the handis of Dauid Coupar as he that drewe him Souerte for the
saide wole to the said' Dauid

Eodem die nicholaius elphinstone de glak fecit constituit creauit et nominauit magistrum
Johannem marschele suum legittimum et Indubitatem procuratorem actorem et factorem dans et concedens eidem
ac suis substitutis pluribus aut vni suam liberum potestatem mandatum Speciale ad ad
comperendum coram prepositus et balliuis dicti burgj respondendum que plegio super eum porrecto per Robertum
Jofray quod Ipse releuaret eum de octo petris lane ad manus Dauid Coupar
et cetera Agendum defendendum et cetera promittens de Rato et grato in vberiore forma procuratorij
cum ceteris terminis necessariis et oportunis et cetera

Eodem die Jacobus horell gallicus fecit Constituit creauit et nominauit honorabilem virum gilbertum menyeis
prepositum de Abirdene suum legitimum procuratorem actorem et factorem ad petendum exigendum et recipiendum
summas salmonum et correorum subscripti a mercatoribus substituenti ad vsum et commodum
suum videlicet

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta In pretorio Eiusdem xxiijo die
mensis Junij Anno quo supra

The said day the Prouest ballies counsaile ande communite of the said burgh'
warnit opinly be the hand bell throue ale the toune gatherit and circualy
Inquerit be Johnne of mar ane of the bailyeis and Williame Scrimgeour offi
ciar grantit and consentit ale in ane voce concordande to pas' ande defend
ane summonce of oure Souerane lordis maid vpoun the haile toune anent
the custome of the Salmone of xx yeris bigane et cetera Ande chesit thir personis
gilbert menyeis prouest Dauid menyheis his fadir ser Johnne ruthirfurde
Johnne of cullane Androu cullane Johnne colisone James colisone Johne'
of mar ande alexander gray thar procuratouris to pas' ande defend the said
Summonce and ordanit ande consentit to rais' ane taxt of jC merkis to be
takin and rasit of of ale thame that Intromettis with salmonde fische' and
of thame that garris haue thame vteuth' the realme' Ande chesit ordanit
and nemmit Johnne of cullane Androu cullane James colisone thomas
Waus Alexander gray and george bisset taxtoris to extent the samyne quhilkis
deponit the gret aitht tile extent taxt and sett the said Some eftir
thar conscience and knawleg'

The said day gilbert menyheis Prouost perofferit the beir bocht fra the almaris at
command' of the townn' to the nychboures and Induellaris of the burgh' reddy at the key
to be deliuerit to thame besekand' thaim to cum and ressaue samekle' as euery man wald'
tak of the pris' bocht at thar command protestand' gif thai ressauit bocht the said beir that he
and his frendis mycht ressaue It

The said day the prouost and baillies with awis' of the Counsaill ordand' and chargit
Niniane blinseill to red' and devoid' the chamer quhilkis he Inhabitis till Elizibetht
leslie the Relict' of Dauid blinseill and cuthberd' Jhonnstoun' hir spous moderne eftir
the tenour of hir Instrument of coniunctfeftment producit in Jugment vndir the Seill of thomas
Waus bailye for the tyme and ser Johnne' Stirueling notar

The said day the prouost bailyes Counsaill and communite warnit be the
handbell and circualie be the officiaris Inquerit grantit and gef all in ane
voice concordand to ser Dauy Waus chaplane Sanct thomas the marthiris
hospitall vacand' be deces' of ser Androu chamer last possessour of the
samyn for all the dais of his lyve he doand' devine suffrag for the saulis
of the fundaris and kepand' the forme of the fundacioun' of the samyn and ordanit
to gif thar common' Seill tharapone'

head.add: The grant of v li' of annuat pensioun' to ser androw collison'

div.p:
The said day the prouest counsaill and communite warnit be the hand' bell
and circualie be the officiaris Inquerit grantit and gef to ser Androu' collisone for
his gratuyteis and seruice done to thame ane annuat pensioun' of fyve pundis vsuall
money of scotland' for the fermis and malis of the said burgh' ay and to the tyme
thai promove him till ane perpetuall chaplanry or seruice extendand' to the awaill of
the said pensioun'

The saide day Dauid gardin bonetmakar was conuikit be ane suorne assis'
thomas chamer of quyltis forspekar for the strublance of Johnne cuke
off sergeand' in the execucioun' of his office And' till amend as law will
and forbeir in tyme tocum And the said Johnne quyt of all strublance of
the said Dauid And that was gevin for dome'

The said day muriell modir to the said Dauid was inamerciament
of the court be the said assis' for the strublance of the said Johnne cuk officiar
and till amend as law will and forber in tyme tocum And atour the amendis
was referrit to the prouoist baillies and counsall

Curia Balliuorum burgi de Abirdene' Tenta in pretorio Eiusdem vicesimo sexto
die Mensis Junii Anno quo supra

Eodem die mariota biris amerciatur per Assisam Juratam pro perturbio Margarete yong
et dicta Margareta amerciatur pro perturbio ipsius mariote et vtraque pars in manda
bat altari pro Jura volunt

The said day the Prouest and bailyeis continewit the borgh' strikin be William
Watsone in the handis of Androue nauchti officiar one Androue grig
to the hame cuming of Duncan fif and Robert moyses becaus the assis' suorne
culd nocht desid vpone the said borgh' without the saidis Duncan and Robert

Curia balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vltimo die mensis
Junij Anno Dominj et cetera quingentesimo octauo

The said day comperit James collisone befor the Prouost and baillies ande
schew how he was souerte for Ranald' oudny and Duncan oudny till entir thame
within the tolbutht for ministracioun' of Justice Nocht withstanding the said prouost
and bailyeis supercedit the s entires of the said personis for Ressonabill caus' quhill
he was new warnit to entir thame And dischargit the said James of
of the said Souerte quhill new warning

Eodem die Johannes craik amerciatur in defectu presencie citatus per sergeandum
et non comparuit

The said day James collisone Enterit Ranald oudny and Duncan oudny befor the
Prouost and baillies of the said burgh' as he that was oblist to entir thame' the
said day till vndirly the law for strublance of the townn' And' anent ony partie
complenyeand on tham and specialie be Dauid lyoun' and William lyn lyoun' And'
thai beand' entirit na partie comperand' to follou thame the said James
was lauchfully dischargit of all the said borrowgang

The said day Robert reid' enterit Williame Dawgerus befor the
ballies as he that come souerte for the entires' of the samyn'

The said day the prouest and baillies assignit this day' fiftene
dais to ser thomas bynne on' that ane part and Johnne' andirsone one
that ane vthir part to comper befor thame and the Counsaill bringand'
with thaim thar charteris euidentis and richtis quhilkis thai haue and
wil wse anent the tua merkis of annuell rent clamit be the saidez ser
thomas bynne of ane land' liand' in the gallougat quhilkis the
said Johnne andirsone is ane of the posessioueis of the samyn'

Curia balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem tercio die
mensis Julij Anno Dominj et cetera quingentesimo octauo

The said day Robert Waus denyit the the strublance to thomas Waus thomas
lesly and vthiris masteris of the wateris et cetera in the fischeing dovne at the havin
moutht eftir the tenour of the bill of complaynt gevin tharapone offering
him to vndirlie the decisioun' of ane assis' tharanent Ande the prouest and
baillies assignit him wedinsday that nixt cummys till ansuer to the
said borght eftir the tenour of the said bill gevin In tharapon'

The said day ser Johnne' ruthirfurd knicht exponit and schew to the prouost
and baillies that Robert Waus held' ane dur' and certane wyndois oppin in
his clois' besekand' thame to ger vesy thame and gif ressone war to ger'
clois' thame And' the said robert besoucht thaim to wesy the samyn And gif
thai suld' aucht be closit of ressone thai suld' be closit within xxiiij houris thareftir

The said day the Robert Waus protestit that he mycht haue preuileg to complene'
apoun' ser Johnne ruthirfurd knicht siclik wis' as he complenit on' hyme

The said day the borgh' fundin be Alexander nory one Robert Waus for the
wranguis' withhalding fra him of four girssillis was funding of nain availl
be ane suorn' assis' Johnn' of cullan' forspekar for the quhilkis the said alexander
was in amerciament of the court

Eodem die Elizibetht lesly relicta quondam Alexander menyeis fecit constituit
et creauit thomam lesly patricium reid' et patricium leslie coniunctim et diuisim suos
legitimos procuratores et cetera dantes et concedentes eisdem ac cuilibet suam potestatem et cetera
ad prosequendum Dauid flaconer de ballandrow pro vno equo precium xl s' Agendum
prosequendum defendendum et Promittens se Ratum gratum et cetera cum ceteris terminis et clausulis
necessarijs et oportunis

The said day the prouost baillies and Counsaill feit and conducit ser Johnne'
fyff for ane yeir to mak continuall gud seruice in singing at all his power
in thar paris krik and queir' of the said burgh' in matinis Evinsang mess'
completorijs and al vthir singyne seruice in the said kirk ffor the quhilkis thai promittit him
fourtj schillingis of thar vthir mylne and ane burges wortht xl s' with his burding
circualie as he has now And' gif the said ser Johnne failyeis in his seruice
fyve tymes in the monetht he salbe punyst be the prouest vicar' balyeis and
Counsale of the saide burghe in his fee as thai think It expedient

The said' day the prouest ballieis and Counsale ordanit the denys of the gilde to gif
to ser thomas bynne chaplane four' pundis vsuale money of Scotland'
in Augmentacioun' of his fee of this tua yeris bigane for his gude seruice
done and to be done as efferis

The saide day the prouest and balyeis continewit the actioun' persewit be sere Dauid
liele chaplane of Sanct elegij altar agane Sandy talyour anent thre termes
annuele befor witsonday last bigane and the said' witsonday terme quhile
wednisday that next cumis and thane to pas' with him and se him pvnd'
for his said' annuell et cetera

Curia balliuorum de Aberdene' tenta In pretorio eiusdem quinto die mensis
Julij Anno quo supra

The said day the prouost and bailyeis assignit friday that nixt cummys
to Robert Waus to ansuer' to the borgh' fundin on' him be ser Johnne ruthirfurd'
knicht And decernit the copy of the said borgh' to the said Robert on' his expensis

The said day Robert Waus grantit him awand' to Johnne' Kay skippar
xxvij s' vj d' for fraucht aucht till him quhilkis the said Robert tuk pay
within xxiiij houris eftir thai had' comptit and Reknyt

Vniuersis pateat per presentes Nos prepositum balliuis consules et communitatem
burgi de Abirdene' vnanum consense et assensu matura auisiacione prehabita
dedisse concessisse asignasse et hoc presenti scripto nostro confirmasse nostro
predilecto et confidenti capellano domino andree colisone vnam annuam pensionem
quinque librarum vsualis monete scocie annuatim leuandum de firmis nostris ide quinqua
quinta octo solidos et octo denarios de firmis molendinj nostri superiorum dictj burgi
et quadraginta vnum solidos et quatuor denarios de firmis terrarum nostrarum de sche
thoisley cum suis pertinencijs semper et quousque eundem dominum andream ad vberiore capellanum
perpetuum siue seruicium perpertuum promonere contigimus pro suis gratidudinibus et
nobis multipliciter et heredum totam et Integram dictam annuam
pensionem quinque librarum prefato domino andrea semper et quousque per nos promotus
fuerit ad cappellaniam perpetuam vberiorem seu seruicium perpetuum vberiorem dicte
annue pensionis excdenti Cum omnibus et singulis libertatibus commoditatibus et asiamentis
ac Justis suis pertinenciis quibuscumque Ac capiendum et leuandum de firmis molendinarum
et terrarum de schethoisly antedicte cum suis pertinenciis annuatim ad manus proprias ad
duos annj terminos vsuales videlicet sancti martinj in hieme et pentecostes per
equales prociones Ac cum libera potestate huiusmodi molendinum et terra de schethosly
Inhabitanti et occupanti eisdem ac sua bona ad manus proprias pro dictam annua
pensione siue quocumque Juris ministro namare et distringens tociens
opus fuerit Adeo libere plenarie integre honorifice bene et in pace pro in omnibus et per omniam
antequa annua pensione infra regum scocie datur conceditur aut possidet
sine reuocacione reclamacione aut contradictione aliquali nostrum heredum nostrorum aut successorum
aliorum quorumcumque Et nos viro dictus prepositus balliui consules et communitas
dicti burgi obligantus no heredes et successores nostros ad varantyandum
acquietandum et defendendum totam et Integram dictam annuam pensionem quinque
libram' prefato domino Andree et suis assignatis pro toto tempore vite sue
donec promotus fuerit per nos ad vberiorem capellaniam perpetuam in
omnbus et per omniam vt premissum est per omnes terras ac possessiones nostros'
fraude et dole se claus' In cuius rej testimonium presentibus Sigillum nostrum commune
est appensum apud dictum burgum xxiiijo die mensis Junij Anno Dominj
millesimo quingentesimo viijo

Vniuersis pateat per presentes nos prepositum balliuos consules et communitatem burgi de Abirdene
vnanimj consensu et assensu pro diuinj seruicij sustentacione in honorem dej omnipotentis
beatissime virginis marie beati nicholaij et omnj sanctorum dedisse concessisse et hoc
presenti scripto nostro conirmasse nostro dilecto famuliari capellano domino Andree
couper musico vnam annuam pensionem septem librarum et octo solidorum vsualis
monete scocie inde quadraginta octo solidos annuatim luandum de firmis nostri
molendinj superiorum Et quinque libras de firmis nostris burgalibus perticarum
terrarum nostrarum ad duos annuj terminos vsualis penticostes et sanctj martinj in yeme
pequales porciones pro toto tempore vite sue pro suo fideli seruicio et personali
residencia infra ecclesiam nostram parrochialem dicti burgi Impenendo faciendo
et continuando ad celebracionem matutinarum vesperarum completorij
missarum ac aliarum horarum quorumcumque tam in choro ecclesiam quod ad
organa prout in eisdem certis temporibus elapsis perseuerauit Tenendo
et habendum totam et Integram dictam annuam pensionem cum pertinenciis prefato
domino Andree pro toto tempore vite sue Ad capiendum ad duos annuj terminos
ad manus proprias libere quiete plenarie integre sine quocumque Impedi
mento ffaciendo et cantando inde dictus dominus Andreas domina suffragia
et seruicia in dictis choro et ecclesia solita et consueta prout alij conducticij
cantores in huiusmodi ecclesia in diuinis astringuntur Non obstans si contingat
nos aut successores nostros prefatum dominum Andream ad quamcumque capella
niam perpetuam promonere Tunc licitum erit nobis partem dictem annue pensionis
ad valorem prefate capellanie ad vsus nostros appropriare sine quocumque
obstaculo In cuius rej testimonium presentibus Sigillum nostrum comune est appensum
apud abirdene quarto die mensis Julij anno Domini Millesimo quingentesimo octauo
